title: Assessing the Legacies of Historical Redlining: Correlations with Measures of Modern Housing Instability
driving_question: How have historical redlining policies affected current housing instability in the United States?
tasks: Research the history of redlining in the United States
Analyze the correlation between redlining and modern housing instability
Evaluate the effectiveness of current policies aimed at addressing the legacy of redlining
Propose alternative policies or strategies to mitigate the negative impacts of redlining
pre_thinking_prompts: What do you know about redlining and its historical context?
How might historical housing policies continue to impact communities today?
reflection_prompt: Reflect on the legacy of redlining. How has your understanding of its impacts changed after this mission? What strategies do you think could effectively address these issues?
ai_tutor_prompts: Can you explain the concept of redlining?
What are some of the current measures of housing instability?
What is the correlation between historical redlining and current housing instability?
What are some of the policy implications of these findings?
remix_zone: Consider how the legacy of redlining might be addressed in your own community. What strategies might be effective? How could you advocate for these changes?
